message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly beneficial for you.  Given its value, I'm offering it at $16,000.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers within $10,000. Would you be willing to adjust the price accordingly?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $16,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget, I am comfortable to consider an offer around $11,000. Would that be possible?
